HighlightSize.summary:
The size property returns the number of objects in a
object.

remarks.para:
-{{domxref("css_custom_highlight_api", "The CSS Custom Highlight API", "", "nocode")}}
-CSS Custom Highlight API: The Future of Highlighting Text Ranges on the Web

HighlightSize.value: The value of size is a read-only integer representing how many entries the highlight object has.
